body: $PQEFF ‚Ä¶
$PQEFF

If you do not tender and the deal goes through the stock may trade for a few more days then at some point be delisted. Your shares will be in limbo at this point until all legal requirements for the acquisition are met. This could take several weeks or months. Then your broker will be contacted and you will receive new stock ( if acquiring company is a public company) or cash
created_at: equivalent to the tender price in your account.
